biography_text: MacARTHUR, Thomas Charles, a Representative from New Jersey; born in Hebron, Tolland County, Conn., October 16, 1960; graduated from RHAM High School, Hebron, Conn., 1978; B.A., Hofstra University, Hempstead, N.Y., 1982; insurance executive and CEO; member of the Randolph, N.J., city council, deputy mayor, mayor, 2011-2014; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fourteenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2015-present).
